action_item: Workflow - Share screen to walk through the intake process in NextGen
notes: Focus on where information is entered and any discrepancies in field usage.

action_item: Requirements - Confirm eligibility criteria for vaccine services
notes: Eligibility includes being uninsured, underinsured, or a Medicaid recipient.

action_item: Data Migration - Ensure documentation of eligibility is transferred to NextGen
notes: Eligibility verification is currently done on paper and later entered into NextGen.

action_item: Reports - Set up reporting requirements for state VFC program reviews
notes: Reports include documentation of patient eligibility and billing details.

action_item: Interface - Query Immunet records for vaccination history
notes: Ensure the feature to compare NextGen data with Immunet is functioning.

action_item: Reports - Open a ticket for NextGen updates regarding vaccine schedules
notes: Address discrepancies in vaccine administration schedules.
